name: Another Portal Game?
description:
It looks like a regular portal game, but is it really?

Controls:

Mouse : You can open a portal from anywhere by clicking near the platforms.  When there are two portals, the character is going to move automatically to the first portal opened. The goal is to activate the door by collecting all the stones and reach the door.

Game by Codaglide Games

Note : We are planning to improve our game and publish it in mobile platforms. So we welcome all your ideas and suggestions at the comment section.

Note : If you are playing on the browser and If you cannot select the levels on the level selection screen, please change the page affinity and reenter the levels screen by pressing the start button.  Later we are going to fix the problem.
